sqlMap.select: SELECT cm.COMMENT_NUM, cm.SHOWBOARD_NUM, cm.MEMBER_NUM, cm.CONTENT, cm.REG_DATE, cm.RE_STEP, cm.RE_LEVEL, cm."REF", mb."NAME" FROM SHOWCASECOMMENT cm join MEMBER mb on cm.MEMBER_NUM = mb.MEMBER_NUM ORDER BY ref DESC, re_step ASC
SELECT max(no) as no FROM SHOWCASECOMMENT
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SHOWCASECOMMENT(COMMENT_NUM, SHOWBOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, CONTENT, REG_DATE, RE_STEP, RE_LEVEL, REF) VALUES (COMMENT_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #showboard_num#, #member_num#, #content#, #reg_date#, #re_step#, #re_level#, COMMENT_NUM_SEQ.CURRVAL)

INSERT INTO SHOWCASECOMMENT(COMMENT_NUM, SHOWBOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, CONTENT, REG_DATE, RE_STEP, RE_LEVEL, REF) VALUES (COMMENT_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #showboard_num#, #member_num#, #content#, #reg_date#, #re_step#, #re_level#, #ref#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SHOWCASECOMMENT SET re_step=re_step+1 WHERE ref=#ref# AND re_step>#re_step#
